sentences.en: a famous film clip which has been shown countless times
sentences.cn: 播放了无数次的一段著名电影选段

sentences.en: I have twenty novels and countless magazine stories to my credit.
sentences.cn: 我著有20部小说，还在杂志上发表了无数篇文章。
我已经告诉你无数遍了.

sentences.en: In the war countless innocent people lost their lives.
sentences.cn: 在这场战争中无数无辜的人丧失了性命.

sentences.en: It falls to our generation to fulfill the great aspirations cherished by countless martyrs in the past.
sentences.cn: 过去无数先烈的远大抱负,要我们这一代去实现.

sentences.en: Only after countless rewrites did John consider the script ready.
sentences.cn: 只有经过了无数次修改后，约翰才认为剧本写好了。

sentences.en: Paul had arrested countless men like this one before and was expecting a clean, quick job.
sentences.cn: 此前，保罗逮捕过无数个这样的家伙，他估计这次能手到擒来。

sentences.en: Rivers and streams have overflowed their banks in countless places.
sentences.cn: 在许多地方，河流与小溪都已经决堤。

sentences.en: She brought joy to countless people through her music.
sentences.cn: 她用音乐给无数的人带来欢乐。

sentences.en: The inscription on the stone tablet has been rubbed away by the hands of countless tourists over the centuries.
sentences.cn: 石碑上的碑文经过几个世纪被无数游客的手磨光了。

sentences.en: The past has been scarred by countless mistrials and perversions of justice.
sentences.cn: 过去数不清的冤假错案和枉法行为给人们带来了创伤。

sentences.en: The past has been scarred by countless perversions of justice.
sentences.cn: 无数的是非颠倒使过去的岁月伤痕累累。

sentences.en: The sky was set with countless stars.
sentences.cn: 天空点缀着无数的星星.

sentences.en: Their sculptors carved countless figures of her.
sentences.cn: 他们的雕刻家塑造了无数个她的形象.

sentences.en: There are countless small ski areas dotted about the province.
sentences.cn: 该省内遍布着许多小型滑雪场。

words.tran_cn: 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者

trans.tran_cn: 无数的，多得数不清的，恒河沙数，指不胜屈，数不胜数
